item.title: [COLOR deepskyblue]FILMES NETCINE.US (Escolhe o que queres ver)

regex.name: hd
regex.expres: #$pyFunction import re,requests def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m):#Pustule url1 = re.findall('iframe src="([^"]+)',page_data)[0].replace('amp;','') r = requests.get(url1,headers={'Referer':'[makelist.param3]','User-Agent':'Mozilla/5.0','X-Requested-With':'XMLHttpRequest'}).content.decode('ascii','ignore') url2= re.findall('src="([^"]+)',r)[0] r = requests.get(url2,headers={'Referer':url1,'User-Agent':'Mozilla/5.0','X-Requested-With':'XMLHttpRequest'}).content.decode('ascii','ignore') return re.findall('file: "([^"]+)',r)[-1]
